items.content_html: Hard to see anything but a comfortable Newcastle win today. With #SaintsFC missing what little attacking spark we have we’ll likely be reliant on set pieces to score. Hope I’m wrong. ⚽

items.content_html:
So exciting to see Lewis beginning this new chapter. The ‘25 season is just around the corner now. 🏎️

BBC Sport

Lewis Hamilton drives Ferrari Formula 1 car for first time - BBC Sport

Crowds gather as Lewis Hamilton drives a Ferrari Formula 1 car for the first time at the team’s Fiorano test track.

items.title: 🍺 12 Belgian Birthday Beers of 2024
items.content_html:
A little summary after working my way through 12 Belgian beers gifted to me for my birthday. Largely it’s been an enjoyable selection with just a couple of weak offerings. Mostly, these were all new to me. The Jupiler and Duvel I’ve seen everywhere but never tried and it’s easy to see why they’re popular. The St. Barnadus and Westmalle are real discoveries and I’m really happy to have found them - they’ll be reappearing in my future for sure!

# Beer
1 De Koninck Bolleke ★★★☆☆
2 Brugse Zot Blond ★★★☆☆
3 Duvel 6.66% ★★★★☆
4 Vedett Extra Pilsner ★★★☆☆
5 Chimay Gold ★★☆☆☆
6 Blanche de Bruxelles ★★★☆☆
7 Timmermans Lambicus Kriek Black Pepper ★★★★☆
8 Jupiler Red ★★★★★
9 St. Barnardus Pater 6 ★★★★★
10 Liefmans Kriek Brut ★☆☆☆☆
11 Westmalle Trappist Extra ★★★★☆
12 Leffe Blonde ★★★★★
items.content_text:
A little summary after working my way through 12 Belgian beers gifted to me for my birthday. Largely it's been an enjoyable selection with just a couple of weak offerings. Mostly, these were all new to me. The Jupiler and Duvel I've seen everywhere but never tried and it's easy to see why they're popular. The St. Barnadus and Westmalle are real discoveries and I'm really happy to have found them - they'll be reappearing in my future for sure!

items.content_html: Beer no. 12, Leffe Blond. Saved this until last as it’s long been a favourite of mine. Delicious and refreshing. It’s popular and mainstream for a reason. ★★★★★
items.content_text:
Beer no. 12, [Leffe Blond](https://leffe.com/en/beer?name=leffe-blonde). Saved this until last as it's long been a favourite of mine. Delicious and refreshing. It's popular and mainstream for a reason. ★★★★★

![An opened bottle of Leffe Blonde beer rests on a countertop. The bottle is dark brown and has a label with the name "Leffe" in gold lettering. The bottle cap, also gold, lies on the countertop next to the bottle](https://jason.dea.bz/uploads/2025/pxl-20241231-171908389.jpg)
